attributes.action: Rebuild the economy and infrastructure of the UK
attributes.additional_details: to rebuild schools, roads ,buildings,bridges, tunnels, water supplys sewers eletrical grids (make all of power producing facilitys in control of the govement ) , transport (excluding HS2 ) buses,shipping ,planes (zero emitions) trucks .
attributes.background: to produce technology and products (e.g. vehicles ,building , hospitals , dugs and pharmasoticals ) to take whats best of other countrys and too see if it possible to make it in uk also to make economic alliances with other countrys which are non-eu or european countrys with who are less developed .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Private businesses, not the Government or Parliament, are responsible for producing manufactured goods.

The Government is responsible for national infrastructure, but it's not clear if you want all national infrastructure to be rebuilt.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to start a new petition you'd also need to provide your full name.
